objectives.name: We start to have a unified approach across Mozilla of recruiting, aligning and investing in mobilizers

results.name: Onboarding
results.description: Shared onboarding framework and tools are identified for Reps, Regional Coaches, Club Leads and Resource Leads

scoring.0.6: We have collected all current onboarding processes
scoring.1.0: Onboarding processes are analyzed and common parts identified

results.name: Activate
results.description: At least half of Reps activities are in support of activities prioritized on Activate mobilizer portal

scoring.0.3: more than half of activities in favour of Activate in January
scoring.0.6: more than half of activities in favour of Activate in January/February (averaged)
scoring.1.0: more than half of activities in favour of Activate in January/February/March (averaged)

results.name: Core Contributor Sentiment
results.description: Core community sentiment > 11.5 NPS (Net Promoter Score)

scoring.0.3: Reps Role is updated and responsibilities are documented

objectives.name: We have a strong base in our transformation towards a mobilizer program

results.name: Communication Channels
results.description: Communication channels have a clear purpose and we have a list of defined content to share on these channels

scoring.0.2: All communication channels are analyzed and documented.
scoring.0.4: Deprecated communication channels are clearly communicated.
scoring.0.8: Proposal for communication strategy is done.
scoring.1.0: The communication strategy is in place and clearly documented.

results.name: Discourse Watching
results.description: 100% Reps watching both Reps and NDA discourse by the end of February.

scoring.0.5: There is a plan on how to achieve this.

results.name: Coaching
results.description: We have a clear plan on Coaching in the Reps program in 2017 and the Leadership track is open for applications to run a draft training

scoring.0.3: There is plan on how to integrate the RepsNext coaching efforts
scoring.0.6: The Leadership track and the Coaching parts are documented
scoring.1.0: The Leadership track is open for applications

results.name: Resources Track
results.description: Reps Resources Training is finished and the Resources track is open for applications

scoring.0.3: The Resources training draft is open for feedback.
scoring.1.0: The Resources track is open for applications.

results.name: Community Participation Guidelines
results.description: At least 50 Reps have given feedback on the draft Community Participation Guidelines

scoring.0.3: We have received the draft for the CPG
scoring.0.6: Call to action for feedback is done and pushed
